```{r}
x = c(1,0.5,0.25,2,4,6,10)
y = c(20.5,42.7,80.4,10.5,6.1,6.0,3.5)
sum(1/x)
sum(y)
sum((1/x)*y)
sum((1/x)^2)
(sum(1/x))^2
```
